product_summary: DebuGPT is a desktop app that helps you debug your code easily. It provides you with the right code to fix your bugs, and it can also help you understand why your code is not working as expected.
product_pros: Provides the right code to fix bugs
Helps you understand why your code is not working
Can be used to debug both local and remote code
product_cons: May not be able to fix all bugs
Can be slow to analyze large codebases
May require some training to use effectively
May not be compatible with all development environments

product_usecases.details: DebuGPT can help you debug complex codebases by providing you with the right code to fix bugs. It can also help you understand why your code is not working as expected.
DebuGPT can help you learn to code by providing you with feedback on your code. It can also help you understand why your code is not working as expected.
DebuGPT can help you pair program by providing you with feedback on your code. It can also help you understand why your code is not working as expected.
DebuGPT can help you review code by providing you with feedback on the code. It can also help you understand why the code is not working as expected.
DebuGPT can help you with continuous integration by providing you with feedback on your code. It can also help you understand why your code is not working as expected.

product_toolfor.details: DebuGPT is a tool for developers that helps them debug their code.
DebuGPT is a tool for students that helps them learn to code.
DebuGPT is a tool for teachers that helps them teach their students to code.
DebuGPT is a tool for software engineers that helps them debug their code.
DebuGPT is a tool for code reviewers that helps them review code.
